dc.title: Arithmetic /
dc.creator: Sandburg, Carl, 1878-1967.
Rand, Ted, ill.
dc.description: A poem about numbers and their characteristics. Features anamorphic, or distorted, drawings which can be restored to normal by viewing from a particular angle or by viewing the image's reflection in the provided Mylar cone.
One Mylar sheet included in pocket.
dc.subject: Arithmetic
Children's poetry, American.
Arithmetic
American poetry.
Visual perception.
